entry.def: A detailed report or plan contains a lot of details.

example.ex: Yesterday's letter contains a detailed account of the decisions...
example.tran: 昨天的那封信里有对这些决议的详细说明。

example.ex: I started drawing up more detailed budgets.
example.tran: 我开始起草更详尽的预算方案。

means.word_mean: 1. developed or executed with care and in minute detail;
